results.title: Fracture Patterns in Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus: A Narrative Review of Recent Literature
results.text_hl: Furthermore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is the first line treatment for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@, meaning that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use could be a reflection of a less severe or shorter duration of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@, and the decreased @<m>DISEASE_Fractures_Bone</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@fracture@@@ risk might thus be partly attributable to the lower overall risk of @<m>DISEASE_Fractures_Bone</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@fracture@@@ among @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users .

results.title: Hyperbaric oxygen and metformin treatment in ovarian torsion preserves ovarian reserve.
results.text_hl: Methods: Forty female Wistar-Albino @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were divided into five groups: control, @<m>DISEASE_Fractures_Bone</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@torsion@@@/detorsion (T), @<m>DISEASE_Fractures_Bone</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@torsion@@@/detorsion + @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (TM), @<m>DISEASE_Fractures_Bone</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@torsion@@@/detorsion + HBOT (THBO), and @<m>DISEASE_Fractures_Bone</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@torsion@@@/detorsion + @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ + HBOT (TMHBO).

results.title: Metformin regulates bone marrow stromal cells to accelerate bone healing in diabetic mice
results.text_hl: The effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on osteoclasts in various @<m>DISEASE_Fractures_Bone</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@bone fracture@@@ models warrant future research.

results.title: Metformin treatment reduces the incidence of osteoporosis: a two-sample Mendelian randomized study.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: This study indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment is significantly associated with a reduction in the risk of @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@OP@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Fractures_Bone</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@fracture@@@ and higher LS-BMD, FN-BMD, and eBMD.

results.title: Metformin: Is It the Well Wisher of Bone Beyond Glycemic Control in Diabetes Mellitus?
results.text_hl: Several studies in both preclinical and clinical settings report the favorable effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on bone microarchitecture, bone mineral density, bone turnover markers, and @<m>DISEASE_Fractures_Bone</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@fracture@@@ risk.

results.title: Metformin adherence is associated with lower risk of osteoporotic fracture among patients with advanced type 2 diabetes.
results.text_hl: AIMS: To evaluate whether adherence to concurrent @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@) therapy is associated with a reduced risk of @<m>DISEASE_Fractures_Bone</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@fractures@@@ among @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@).

results.title: Antidiabetic Treatment, Level of Glycemic Control, and Risk of Fracture in Type 2 Diabetes: a Nested, Case-Control Study.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: While @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with good or medium glycemic control receiving current @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ monotherapy had a lower risk of @<m>DISEASE_Fractures_Bone</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@fracture@@@ compared with untreated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, glycemic control in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ receiving treatment other than @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was not associated with risk of @<m>DISEASE_Fractures_Bone</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@fracture@@@.

citations.NLM: Charlier S, Vavanikunnel J, Becker C, Jick SS, Meier C, Meier CR. Antidiabetic Treatment, Level of Glycemic Control, and Risk of Fracture in Type 2 Diabetes: a Nested, Case-Control Study. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2021 Jan 23;106(2):554-566. PMID: 33141149

results.title: Effect of metformin on stem cells: Molecular mechanism and clinical prospect
results.text_hl: Numerous studies have shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ not only has hypoglycemic effects, but also modulates many physiological and pathological processes ranging from aging and @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ to @<m>DISEASE_Fractures_Bone</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@fracture@@@ healing.
